articles.title: As Trump's tariffs take shape, is America really winning? - NPR
articles.description: The president says his tariffs will spur America into a "golden age," but that remains far from certain. Here are 5 things to know about how his trade policies could impact the U.S. and the global economy.
articles.content:
When it comes to tariffs, President Trump is clear: America is winning.

articles.description: Sydney Sweeney stepped out for the first time since the uproar began for a Los Angeles screening of the appropriately-titled 'Americana.'

articles.title: ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ holds its lead atop the box office - AP News
articles.description: Marvel's first family faltered in its sophomore weekend at the box office, recording a 66% dip in North American theaters. But the movie still managed to hold on to the No. 1 spot this weekend. “The Fantastic Four: First Steps” earned $40 million, bringing to…
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES (AP) Marvels first family stumbled in theaters in its second weekend, but still held on to the top spot at the box office.
